title: MACD Cross + Pullback
objective: Enter after MACD cross on pullback to EMA with volume.
entry_logic: macd crosses up and pullback to ema20 and vol_z>0
exit_logic: target prior high; stop below pullback swing
caveats: Use small size until validated; avoid illiquid names.
beginner_summary: Combine MACD cross with a pullback entry and volume confirmation.
assistant_hints: Prefer first clean pullback after cross.
